授業目的: この講義ではデータを分析するための基本的な統計学の理論とその実践方法について学習する．実践においてはMicrosoft ExcelやRを使った実習を行い，分析の手続きを学習してもらう．講義で取り扱う内容は，統計学の基本的な概念である記述的統計と推測的統計ならびに回帰分析，そして統計ソフトの紹介である．すべての講義はPCルームで行われ，実習を毎週実施する予定である．
到達目標:
講義の到達目標は次の2つである．
（１）基本的かつ重要な統計学の概念と手法を理解する
（２）基本的な定量分析を適切に実施でき，その結果を解釈できるそうになる
授業方法:
Pre-registration is required to take this course. All classes will be conducted face to face in the classroom.

The class is held in a computer room. After each topic is explained, students perform computer exercises. I believe that the learning process of Statistics should be an interaction between theory and practice. Students who are unfamiliar with math and using a computer might be feeling uncomfortable in the process, but need to be patient and enhance their understanding step-by-step.

第2回: What is the Data?: observations, types of data, variables
第3回: Visualizing Data: frequency distribution table, cross-tabulation, histogram, scatterplot
第4回:
Describing Data (1): average, median, weighted
average, geometric average, moving average
第5回: Describing Data (2): range, standard deviation, quantiles
第6回: Describing Data (3): covariance, correlation coefficient, some other methods
第7回: Regression analysis (1): model specification, ordinary least squares
第9回: Role of Probability in Statistics: sampling, population, probability distribution, random variables
第10回: Probability Distribution: expectation, some theorems, binomial distribution, normal distribution
第11回: Statistical Inference (1): sampling distribution, standard error, interval estimation, student's t-distribution
第12回: Statistical Inference (2): concept of hypothesis testing, null and alternative hypotheses
第13回: Hypothesis Testing: population mean, correlation coefficient, regression coefficients
第14回: Introduction to R: what is R as statistical software? data management and manipulation using R
トピック.授業外学習2: Some mathematical ideas such as probability and numerical sequences (including the notation of sigma) will be used in class. Reviewing these ideas is helpful.
